articles.content: "They used to sit around in the canteen and just huddle over one phone. There was no communication. Since the start of the new school year, secondary school students have been forbidden from using their smartphones outside of class time, including recess and co-curricular activity hours. This move was announced in November last year by the Ministry of Education (MOE)

articles.content: Johor fire and rescue department deputy director Muhammad Al Mustakim Abdul Hady said on Thursday that the fire has been successfully brought under control. "Firefighters are working to ensure that any remaining small fires are fully extinguished to prevent them from spreading," he said.
